metadata.title: CVE-2017-2899 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the TIFF loading functionality ofthe Blender open-source 3d creation suite version 2.78c. A speciallycrafted '.tif' file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a bufferoverflow which can allow for code execution under the context of theapplication. An attacker can convince a user to use the file as an assetvia the sequencer in order to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: blender: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
